Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Shangri-la hotel Toronto, you'll be centrally located in Toronto, steps from Four Seasons Centre and Campbell House Museum. This 5-star hotel is close to CN Tower and University of Toronto.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 202 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPads and minibars. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a 24-hour health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Shangri-la hotel Toronto, you'll be centrally located in Toronto, steps from Four Seasons Centre and Campbell House Museum. This 5-star hotel is close to CN Tower and University of Toronto.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Four Seasons Centre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Campbell House Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Osgoode Hall - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Toronto Symphony Orchestra - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Royal Alexandra Theatre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Roy Thomson Hall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Princess of Wales Theatre - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Nathan Phillips Square - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
TIFF Bell Lightbox - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Toronto City Hall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Metro Toronto Convention Centre - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
CBC Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Ontario College of Art and Design - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Second City - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Canadian Broadcasting Centre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Toronto, ON (YTZ-Billy Bishop Toronto City) - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.) - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi

The preferred airport for Shangri-la hotel Toronto is Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
